VII.i.3.B.6.h
.
Effect of Separation or Termination of a Veteran’s Marriage on a Stepchild’s Status
A stepchild that VA already recognizes as the child of a Veteran does not automatically lose this status when the Veteran and the stepchild’s biological or adoptive parent separate or terminate their marriage.  VA will continue to recognize the stepchild as the Veteran’s child as long as the stepchild remains a member of the Veteran’s household, as defined in
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 3.B.6.c
.
Follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, 3.B.6.i
following receipt of notice that a Veteran and the biological or adoptive parent of the stepchild have separated or terminated their marriage.
